entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
